name: Gemma 3 1B (Instruct)
description: Ultra-lightweight open-source Gemma model optimized for edge devices and resource-constrained environments. Text-only with 32K context.
notes: Open-source model (free to use). Benchmarks: MMLU 38.8, HumanEval 41.5, GSM8K 62.8. Trained on 2T tokens. Available via Google AI Studio free tier or self-hosted. 140+ language support. Requires ~1.5GB memory for inference.
